title: 153. Finance, Influence & Authenticity Ft. Rob Freund
itunes:title: 153. Finance, Influence & Authenticity Ft. Rob Freund
description: Authenticity has never been more valuable than it is now. On today's episode, Andy and the crew are joined by Rob Freund, a lawyer, and advisor for brands, agencies & influencers. They discuss why financial responsibility is an important skill to learn early on in life, the difference between a true entrepreneur and someone who's just looking to make quick money, and how you can grow your brand organically by being yourself.
